info.name: Different Vista-Handcursers For Different Links
info.description:
_________________________________________________________________________
New Version is avaible here http://userstyles.org/styles/16277
_________________________________________________________________________


Changes your Cursers for different hyperlinks

shows special hand for:
-email
-new tab
-for secure sites link
-txt files
-zip files
-pdf files
-exe files
-pictures (jpg, png, bmp)
-music (mp3, aac,wav)
-video (flv, avi, mpeg, mov, ram)

Icons made by myself and their will come many others. If you want some other cursers make a suggestion ;-)
enjoy

1st stable version  / i think it works if you find a bug send me a review

and sry for my bad english =)

actual version 1.4 (video addet)
